laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased creatinine levels from a baseline of 1.5, eventually stabilized at 1.5

laboratory_examinations.findings: Trace of ascites seen in the perihepatic and perisplenic areas; large spleen noted similar to the previous examination.
<10 PMNs and <10 epithelial cells/100X field. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN. QUALITY OF SPECIMEN CANNOT BE ASSESSED.
